name: The Quest for Age Reversal
description:
Made hastily for Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2

The interpretation of rewind here is quite straightforward: A grandma rewinds her age by collecting some time orbs

The jam just had to take place on the last week of uni with lots of final projects and reports and stuffs... I unfortunately did not have the leisure to give my all for this jam -- but I made what I could; and all I could make was a very basic simple game

Controls: Arrow keys

Enjoy!
